title: VidConnect
description: A video conferencing platform built with React.js, Next.js, and TypeScript. It offers secure authentication via Clerk, real-time meeting controls, screen sharing, and scheduling.

title: GitHub Insight
description: An open-source project that generates GitHub profiles, roasts profiles using the Google Gemini API, and analyzes GitHub activities. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and APIs, it offers insights and fun.

title: YouTube Clone
description: This project is a fully responsive video-sharing platform built with React JS and Material UI. Offering seamless video playback, it replicates the user experience of YouTube.
